name: Nugget
subtitle: iOS 16.0-18.1b4 Device Unlock Tool
description: Unlock your device's full potential on iOS 16.0 through 18.1 beta 4, with partial support for iOS 18.1 beta 5-6. Note: Does not work on iOS 18.1 beta 7 or newer - use PC version instead. Requires .mobiledevicepairing file and wireguard. Uses sparserestore exploit to write to files outside intended restore location, like mobilegestalt. CAUTION: Back up your data before using. Developer not responsible for bootloops or other issues.
